Phase 1: Create Unified CrewAPIClient Package

Implement foundational CrewAPIClient that serves as single source of truth
for all surfaces \(IDE, CLI, Web, n8n\). This is the critical blocker for
achieving surface parity across the platform.

- Create new package: domains/shared/crew-api-client/
- Implement TypeScript types and interfaces for all operations
- Implement authorization service with RBAC
- Implement audit logging service \(immutable trail\)
- Implement CrewAPIClient class with core operations:
  * Memory operations: create, retrieve, update, delete, restore
  * Crew operations: execute
  * Audit operations: getAuditLog
- All operations follow pattern: Intent → Auth → Execute → Log → Return
- All operations enforce semantic/authorization/audit parity
- All operations track cost transparently

BENEFITS:
✅ Single API for all surfaces \(no bypasses\)
✅ Consistent authorization across all surfaces
✅ Immutable audit trail for all operations
✅ Transparent cost tracking
✅ Foundation for Phase 2 \(Memory Decay & Retention\)

Per DRY RUN analysis: CrewAPIClient was BLOCKER #1
Status after this commit: BLOCKER #1 RESOLVED

Next: Add integration tests and surface-specific bindings \(CLI, Web, VSCode, n8n\)

EOF
\)")
